pages.text: Protoplasm is the physical manifestation of the Thread, and is an incredibly malleable, organic substance, that can be shaped in quite a lot of ways. $(o)This could be useful later on...$()

Protoplasm is created by feeding a bestowed $(l:alchemy/entry_flesh_lamb)forgotten memory$() to a $(marked)tamed living being$() (by punching them violently with the food, though a player might eat it instead), destroying the creature's body in the process and rearranging it into a protoplasmic sample. This requires a lot of Magan to work.
